entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy. Blowing snow at times this evening and after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:38 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
